name: m o u r n
description:
a plead. 
a prayer. 

a short poem (iterative poem) exploring the grieving process, as a longterm relationship just ended for me. i tried to make it for the Out Of Mana #1 Jam. headphones in, sound on — that's where the heart(beat) is!

i tried to do the "rhythm" and "sacrifice" side quests but it is poorly executed to say the least. sorry for this.

the ending is not at all satisfying, and it loops and loops and repeats itself, but i guess that's the point? not a good game, not even a good poem, just a personal process i figured What the hell, might as well let others experience it too.
